emails.content: Hi Team, Hope you are well! According to clause 8.8.2 of our Master Service Agreement, the initial term of each Order Form begins on the specified date and continues for the subscription term outlined. After this, the Order Form automatically renews for additional 12-month periods unless we receive a written notice of termination at least 30 days prior to the renewal date. As we did not receive such notice, your licenses have already been activated and are accessible from day one, and we cannot roll them back or modify. Request you to please process the payment for this auto renewal invoice. We trust that these licenses will continue to support your needs effectively. We would like to point out that these automatically renewed licenses might be offered to you at a discounted rate compared to ongoing prices, providing you with significant savings. Just a heads up for the future renewals, if you wish to terminate it, please ensure to send us a termination notice at least 30 days before the current subscription ends. This will allow us to adjust our system to prevent future renewals. . Thank you for your understanding and continued partnership. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further assistance. Regards. Anis Qures

If you received this email in error, please delete it and notify us immediately, and do not use, rely on, distribute, or disclose it.Emails and other communication systems are intrinsically insecure and may contain damaging content. We do not accept responsibility for harm caused by damaging or inauthentic email. Insight investment records and monitors emails, messages, calls, and their contents on a partly selective basis for regulatory compliance, training, and other purposes. Other parties to conversations may also record and process them. Insight Investment processes personal data including communications recordings in compliance with applicable privacy law in the UK, the EEA, the US and other territories. Insight processes personal data to deliver appropriate customer service, to understand our clients and comply with financial service regulations, to inform about our services, to conduct employment relationships, to fulfil our interests with suppliers of goods and services, and to archive communication and activity for regulatory and business requirements. We may transfer data between or within jurisdictions to our partners and suppliers to accomplish our purposes. More information on our processing, transfers, and your rights as a data subject, is available in the Insight Privacy Notice. All privacy enquiries should be passed to privacy@insightinvestment.com. Insight does not sell or trade personal data. Insight Investment is the corporate brand for certain companies operated by Insight Investment Management Limited (IIML). Insight includes, among others, Insight Investment Management (Global) Limited (IIMG), Insight Investment International Limited (IIIL ), Insight Investment Management (Europe) Limited (IIMEL) and Insight North America LLC (INA), each of which provides asset management services. These companies may be referred to as ‘Insight’ or ‘Insight Investment’. In the United Kingdom the business of Insight is conducted by IIMG, IIIL, which are registered in England (Nos. 00827982 and 03169281 respectively). These companies’ registered office is 160 Queen Victoria Street, London, EC4V 4LA. These companies are authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. In certain European countries, the business of Insight is conducted by IIMEL, registered in Ireland, registration number 581405. The registered office is The Shipping Office, 20-26 Sir John Rogerson’s Quay, Dublin 2, D02 Y049. IIMEL is regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland. CBI reference number C154503. In North America the services of Insight are offered by Insight North America LLC under the brand name Insight Investment. In Australia the business of Insight is conducted by Insight Investment Australia Pty Ltd, which is regulated by the Australian Securities and Investments Commission (Licence No. 230541), and registered in Australia (ABN 69 076 812 381). Services in Australia are also carried out by IIMG, which is exempt from the requirement to hold an Australian Financial Services licence in respect of the financial services it provides to wholesale investors in Australia and is authorised and regulated by the (UK) Financial Conduct Authority under UK laws, which differ from Australian laws. In Canada the services of Insight are offered by IIIL and IIMG. I n Japan the services of Insight are offered by IIIL.

emails.content: Hi Parker Thank you for your email. I am writing to inform you that, this license was renewed due to our Auto-Renewal feature going live. INV170605 is an auto renewal of last year's invoice INV142206. We have started this process to try and streamline the Renewal process. We are Auto Renewing our clients if they don't inform us at least 30 days or 60 days prior to their current contract expiring, so they don't face any interruptions in service or any delays. Litera would have required a cancellation notice 30 days or 60 days prior to previous subscription getting expired. This clause is written in Litera Master terms, please refer clause 8.2 of our MSA attached herewith. Litera Master Terms. We will not be able to cancel this invoice at least for this year if Litera has not received any cancellation notice. Request you to please provide any cancellation notice you might have given on this, and I would make sure swiftly to bring this to the attention of our internal team. If you want to cancel for next year, please let me know. Thanks !! threads.subject: Re: Reminder: Invoice INV170036  from Workshare Limited

emails.content: Hello,Thanks for reaching out to the EMEA Accounts Payable team at AlphaSights! This is just a quick note to let you know we’ve received your email, and we’ll be reviewing your inquiry shortly. Here are a few quick tips to help us assist you faster:Invoice Submission: Please make sure all invoices are sent as PDF files.Payment Queries: For questions about payment status, including the invoice number or your company name helps us track it down more easily. You can usually expect a response from us within 2 working days (excluding UK bank holidays).Vendor Information: Need to update your address or bank info? Please submit these on company letterhead.Urgent Matters: For anything urgent, please add “URGENT” to your subject line, and we’ll make it a priority.Thanks for your understanding and patience. Your query is important to us, and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can!
regards,AlphaSights EMEA Accounts Payable Team

emails.content: Hi Sam, Thank you for your email. I am writing to inform you that, these licenses were renewed due to our Auto-Renewal feature going live. INV170360 is an auto renewal of last year's invoice INV145568. We have started this process to try and streamline the renewal process. We are auto renewing our clients if they don't inform us at least 30 days or 60 days prior to their current contract expiring, so they don't face any interruptions in service or any delays. Litera would have required a cancellati

on notice 30 days or 60 days prior to previous subscription getting expired. This clause is written in Litera Master terms, please refer clause 8.2 of our MSA attached herewith. Litera Master Terms. We will not be able to cancel this invoice INV170360 at least for this year if Litera has not received any prior cancellation notice. Request you to please provide any cancellation notice you might have provided on this, and I would make sure swiftly to bring this to the attention of our internal team. If you want to cancel for next year, please let me know. Thanks !!
